thread.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL.... Horrible
thread.title_full: STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL.... Horrible - Review of Epsilon Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Santas
title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL.... Horrible
text: Located next to a street and extremely noisy through the whole night - Very poor breakfast - Very small room - No safety box and cleaning staff mess our suitcase and my wifes design sunglasses was disappeared from the room and people at the reception refuses what happened - There is a lot of immigrants in this area and you can feel unsafe waking alone at the night STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL.... Horrible
